stories.title: “Taken Down” a Look into Apple’s Transparency Reports

stories.text:
I’m Pranav, co-founder of Chatwoot (https://github.com/chatwoot/chatwoot), an open-source alternative to Intercom and Zendesk. What started as a passion project in 2019, gained a lot of momentum recently. This was possible because of all the contributions and love we got from the community.

We’ve created a page ([https://contributors.chatwoot.com/](https://contributors.chatwoot.com/)) to showcase our contributors’ work and give them a platform to share their contributions with the world.

We open-sourced this little project too. We’ve made our repo for other open-source projects to use it as a template and build their own contributions page. It is built on Next.js and runs on Github Pages with Github Actions updating the data regularly.

Check out the project and let us what you think about the project.

[https://github.com/chatwoot/contributors](https://github.com/chatwoot/contributors).
stories.title: Show HN: Contributors page for your open-source project
